Appearance

SpectralLogsHigh-performance logging for Node & Web

Beautiful colors, clean formatting, blazing-fast output, and an extensible plugin system.

Get Started
GitHub
npm

Lightning Fast

Buffered stdout in Node and batched console output in Web dramatically reduce logging overhead.

Rich Colors

ANSI for terminals and CSS styles for browsers, with HEX, RGB, and named colors.

Smart Errors

Clean stack traces, deduplication, and helpful formatting for Error objects.

Plugin System

Extend behavior with before/after hooks; ship Node and Web specific plugins.

TypeScript First

Fully typed API with IntelliSense and zero runtime dependencies.

Universal

Import 'spectrallogs' in Node and 'spectrallogs/web' in browsers or from CDN (esm.sh).

Why SpectralLogs? ​

SpectralLogs replaces console.log with a fast, beautiful, and flexible logger. It supports:

  • Clean, colorized output
  • Timestamps and levels
  • Powerful error formatting
  • Plugins for custom behavior
  • Node and Web builds in a single package
ts
// Node
import spec from 'spectrallogs';
spec.info('Node ready');

// Web
import web from 'spectrallogs/web';
web.success('Web ready');
